results.title: Therapy with statins in patients with refractory rheumatic diseases: a preliminary study.
results.text_hl: A similar kind of therapy had a marked beneficial effect in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Granulomatosis_with_Polyangiitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014890 @@@Wegener's granulomatosis@@@ and a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with @DISEASE_Erythema_Nodosum @DISEASE_MESH:D004893 @@@erythema nodosum@@@.

citations.NLM: Abud-Mendoza C, de la Fuente H, Cuevas-Orta E, Baranda L, Cruz-Rizo J, González-Amaro R. Therapy with statins in patients with refractory rheumatic diseases: a preliminary study. Lupus. 2003;12(8):607-11. PMID: 12945719
